item.title: Costco sues Trump admin seeking tariff refunds before Supreme Court rules if they're illegal
item.description: Costco joined dozens of other companies that are seeking to protect their rights to refunds of Trump's tariffs without first waiting for the Supreme C...

item.title: Trump October MRI results were 'perfectly normal,' White House doctor says
item.description: Trump’s physician, Dr. Sean Barbabella, said in a memo the cardiovascular and abdominal imaging were “perfectly normal."

item.title: White House blasts Boston Globe, CBS News and The Independent for coverage of 'illegal orders' video

item.title: Appeals court disqualifies Trump's N.J. prosecutor pick Alina Habba, rejecting DOJ challenge
item.description: The ruling affirming Habba's disqualification came one week after another Trump-picked prosecutor, Lindsey Halligan, was deemed invalidly appointed.

item.title: Trump says airspace above and surrounding Venezuela to be closed in its entirety
item.description: President Trump's latest comment marks another escalation in U.S.-Venezuela relations.
